alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 22 at 6:46AM EDT until September 23 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 7 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Middlesex and Western Monmouth. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 7 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 22/02 PM 6.5 0.8 1.0 None 23/02 AM 6.0 0.3 1.6 None 23/03 PM 7.9 2.2 2.3 Minor 24/03 AM 6.8 1.1 2.3 None 24/04 PM 7.5 1.8 1.8 Minor Sandy Hook Bay at Sandy Hook MLLW Categories - Minor 6.7 ft, Moderate 7.7 ft, Major 8.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 22/02 PM 6.0 0.8 0.9 None 23/02 AM 5.4 0.2 1.4 None 23/03 PM 7.2 2.0 2.1 Minor 24/03 AM 6.1 0.9 2.0 None 24/03 PM 6.8 1.6 1.7 Minor Watson Creek at Manasquan MLLW Categories - Minor 5.7 ft, Moderate 6.7 ft, Major 7.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 22/01 PM 4.9 0.5 0.3 None 23/02 AM 4.4 -0.0 0.8 None 23/02 PM 6.3 1.9 1.7 Minor 24/03 AM 5.4 1.0 1.7 None 24/04 PM 6.0 1.6 1.2 Minor &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
